name: KeepOnGiving
description:
Made for the Jingle Game Jam 2019

Help create presents by grabbing the right coloured material and use them on the workbenches to create toys and wrap them.  Watch out for the snowman and flying presents which will try and stop you. 

Local co-op game from 1-4 players

KeyBoard

Left mouse button - Pick up/ use workbench

Right mouse button - Throw 

WASD - Move

Gamepad

Left stick - move

A/- pick up/ use workbench

B- Throw 

I hope you enjoy!
